Class UserController

java.lang.Object
com.capgemini.wsb.fitnesstracker.user.internal.UserController

      UserController()

  • Method Details

    • getAllUsers

      @GetMapping public List<UserDto> getAllUsers()
      Retrieves all users from the user service and maps them to a list of UserDto objects.
      Returns:
      a list of UserDto objects representing all users

    • getAllUsersSimple

      @GetMapping("/simple") public List<UserSimpleDto> getAllUsersSimple()
      Retrieves all users from the user service and maps them to a list of UserSimpleDto objects.
      Returns:
      a list of UserSimpleDto objects representing all users

    • getUser

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public UserDto getUser(@PathVariable Long id)
      Retrieves a user with the specified ID from the user service and maps it to a UserDto object.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the user to retrieve
      Returns:
      the UserDto object representing the user with the specified ID, or throws a ResponseStatusException if the user is not found

    • addUser

      @PostMapping @ResponseStatus(CREATED) public User addUser(@RequestBody UserDto userDto) throws InterruptedException
      Adds a new user to the system.
      Parameters:
      userDto - the user data to be added, passed in the request body
      Returns:
      the created user object
      Throws:
      InterruptedException

    • deleteUser

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") @ResponseStatus(NO_CONTENT) public void deleteUser(@PathVariable Long id)
      Deletes a user with the specified ID from the user service.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the user to delete

    • getUsersByEmail

      @GetMapping("/email") public List<UserEmailDto> getUsersByEmail(@RequestParam String email)
      Retrieves users with the specified email from the user service and maps them to a list of UserEmailDto objects.
      Parameters:
      email - the email address to search for in user emails
      Returns:
      a list of UserEmailDto objects representing the users with the specified email

    • getUserOlderThan

      @GetMapping("/older/{time}") public List<UserDto> getUserOlderThan(@PathVariable("time") @DateTimeFormat(pattern="yyyy-MM-dd") LocalDate date)
      Retrieves a list of users who are older than the specified date.
      Parameters:
      time - the date in the format "yyyy-MM-dd" to compare the users' birthdates against
      Returns:
      a list of UserDto objects representing the users who are older than the specified date

    • updateUser

      @PutMapping("/{id}") public User updateUser(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestBody UserDto userDto)
      Updates a user with the specified ID in the user service.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the user to update
      userDto - the updated user data, passed in the request body
      Returns:
      the updated user object
